ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons seeded and minced fresh jalapeno pepper, or to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
1 pound cooked shrimp, shelled and deveined

cookingTips: Prepare the vinegar dressing ahead of time and refrigerate so flavors meld and mellow
Jicama should be peeled and cut just before serving to prevent browning and maintain crispness
Toss all components together gently just before serving to prevent vegetables from becoming waterlogged
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This light, refreshing salad showcases jicama's crisp texture against tender shrimp. How would you adjust the vinegar and sugar ratio if you prefer it more sour or more sweet?
